title: Labor board rejects Amazon’s objections to union victory
description: The NLRB's decision will probably make Amazon Labor Union the first organizers to be certified at the company.

title: U.K. warns Activision merger gives Microsoft ‘unparalleled advantage’
description: Microsoft's acquisition of Activision Blizzard faced its first meaningful hurdle Thursday.

title: Twitter tests edit button as experts warn it could be misused
description: Users have been asking for the ability to edit tweets for years. But the feature could also facilitate misinformation.

title: NASA’s toaster-sized device can make oxygen on Mars
description: NASA and MIT have made a box that converts the carbon-dioxide on Mars into breathable oxygen — a crucial advance if humans want to explore the planet one day.
